background_description: The background consists of numerous irregularly shaped, light-colored pebbles or gravel, dominated by off-white, light gray, and pale beige tones. Some sparse, out-of-focus green plant stems are visible in the background.
explanation: The image clearly displays a toad with mottled green, brown, and yellow patterned skin, resting on a bed of light-colored gravel. Its distinct coloration and warty texture provide a strong visual contrast against the smooth, pale rocks, confirming the absence of camouflage as per the dataset's rules.
